snippet: Comcast is to pay $16.7 billion to buy G.E.'s stake in NBCUniversal. | Large shareholders stiffen opposition to Michael S. Dell's buyout plan. | Apple is engaged in an unusual struggle with a big investor over Apple's huge cash pile. | Regulators are...
abstract: Comcast is to pay $16.7 billion to buy G.E.'s stake in NBCUniversal. | Large shareholders stiffen opposition to Michael S. Dell's buyout plan. | Apple is engaged in an unusual struggle with a big investor over Apple's huge cash pile. | Regulators are seeking help from banks in an effort to distribute money to homeowners in foreclosure.
